channel.title: CVE Feed for AVEVA Software, LLC -- all

item.title: CVE-2021-32999|2024-09-16T16:27:33.462Z -- aveva%20software%2C%20llc -- aveva%20system%20platform%202020
item.description: Improper handling of exceptional conditions in SuiteLink server while processing command 0x01

item.title: CVE-2018-10620|2024-09-16T19:40:31.800Z -- aveva%20software%2C%20llc -- indusoft%20web%20studio
item.description: AVEVA InduSoft Web Studio v8.1 and v8.1SP1, and InTouch Machine Edition v2017 8.1 and v2017 8.1 SP1 a remote user could send a carefully crafted packet to exploit a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability during tag, alarm, or event related actions such as read and write, with potential for code to be executed.
